#summary renderNothing()
#labels api,0.8,controller,request

*Description*:

Renders a blank string to the browser.

*Return Type*:

Void

*

*History*:

-

*Parameters*:
*Usage*:

This is very similar to just doing a <cfabort> with the advantage that any after filters you have set on the action will still be run.

*Examples*:

{{{
<cfset renderNothing()>

}}}

 * [renderPage renderPage()] (function)
